page.title: 19Day in the life of a child
page.content: I get up at six twenty and go downstairs.I make my breakfast and afterwards I take the plates and cups out.Mum brushes my hair and I wash my face,and clean my teeth.I get ready and go to school.When the bell rings I go into school.My teacher calls the register and then I do my maths.We go to assembly and then out to play.Back in school we have to do our spellings. At twelve o'clock we go out to play. After dinner we get ready for games. We play football and rugby touch.When we come back in we do our topic.At twenty to three we have another playtime,And after a story we go home. I have a drink and go outside.At five o'clock I have my tea and watch television.At nine o'clock I go to bed. At the week end I play with my brother and friends. Sometimes if the weather is fine we go to the beach .
